original_text: Immediately after this, Jesus said to his disciples, ‘Get into the boat and sail across the lake to Bethsaida.’ Jesus said that he would first send the crowd away. Then he would also leave.
korean_text: 예수께서 즉시 제자들을 재촉하사 자기가 무리를 보내는 동안에 배 타고 앞서 건너편 벳새다로 가게 하시고

sentences.original_text: and sail across the lake to Bethsaida
Jesus said that he would first send the crowd away
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 먼저 무리를 보내실 것이라고 말씀하셨다
